text: fakhtlft alfiraq fi 'amr eisaa ealayh alslam, wsaru fih shyeana: minhum man yuqirr bi'anah eabd allah wrswlh, wahu alhq, waminhum man yazeum 'anah abn allh, waminhum man yqwl: 'iinah allh, taealaa allah ean qawlihim elwana kbyrana, fhlak wdmar waeadhab 'alim yawm alqiamat liman wsfu eisaa bighayr ma wasafah allah bh
